title: "NSW gov AI projects to face new risk regime"
excerpt: "The AI assurance framework has been developed by the Department of Customer Service to assist agencies to design, build and use the technology “safely and securely”. It comes just weeks after the NSW Ombudsman revealed that Revenue NSW unlawfully used an automated system to recover unpaid debts between 2016 and 2019,"
